headline: Why Interpublic Group (IPG) Stock Is Up Today
summary: Shares of global advertising conglomerate Interpublic Group (NYSE:IPG) jumped 3.3% in the morning session after a peer company, Omnicom (OMC), received an analyst upgrade from Wells Fargo tied to the nearing completion of its merger with Interpublic.

headline: Is Interpublic Group Stock Underperforming the Dow?
summary: Interpublic Group has trailed the broader Dow Jones Industrial over the past year, and analysts are fairly upbeat about its future growth potential.
